data.text:
The first impression in a hostel is the front desk, in this case it was disappointing. Francis from Dominican Republic was so plain, not kind and careless, he did not explain about the way the hostel works, the places you have right to, he was chatting on the phone all the time. I had a luggage bag, 2 backpacks and a little Ukulele he had me walking around the hostel without even offering any help. 
The hostel was very basic, but quite dirty. I just stay one night and I’m glad I didn’t stay longer.
data.title: TripAdvisor certificate is not everything

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi Jose, we understand! Francis and the staff is one of our best rated items regarding what our clients say in the main reputation platforms, maybe your case was isolated!

We offer wifi, private and shared rooms, big kitchen, luggage store and a magnificent location, we hope you return and have better days!

if you do return, it is up to you to choose to pay less for the same product, if you book through our website it will always be cheaper!

Best
owner_response.author: Graciacity

data.text:
Dodgy hostel

Dirty sheets

Loud & cramped

Permanent house guests sleeping all over including on sofas and mattresses in the common area and walking round at 3/4 am 

Dirty all over 

Don’t recommend at all
data.title: Don’t go there

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi sassy, thanks for writing us.

We will check on everything you said, we want everyone to have the best experience with us.

Hope you return and see the changes!
owner_response.author: Graciacity

data.text: We really liked the location of Gràcia City Hostel. It’s in a very earthy bohemian area. The hostel itself was a decent deal but by no means cheap. We rented a 4-bed room for ourselves. Shared bathroom. Noise was tolerated by staff late into the night which was annoying and the bathrooms were not clean. Basic Breakfast Bat downstairs was a great deal at only €3 per person.
data.title: Good location but needs improvement

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thanks Galle for rating Gracia City Hostel, our locations is really nice, near metro, bars, restaurants, and really close to main touristic attractions! Key things to have a great experience in Barcelona

We have 12 bed, 8 bed, 4 bed, 2 bed and private. Maybe you needed a cheaper one, we have available!

Our breakfast is recomendable, very cheap and very complete, you won't find something like that on bars/restaurants!

We are working on our cleaning, is improving little by little.

Regards from Spain!
owner_response.author: Graciacity

data.text: The worst hostel i have ever visited....dirty, not polite and also we got robbed.... The toilets were dirty as hell and the beds like they have never been cleaned. The only good thing is the location near the city centre.........
data.title: Stay Away

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi, thanks we are here to improve with your feedback.

Our staff is very often congratulated, it must have been a rare thing. Also we understand that when you have an experience as yours, everything will seem bad. We can't keep an eye on every guest all the time, so we ask you to take care of your things, if you use the lockers well you won't have a problem!

The cleaning is improving, new staff, new procedures, so if you come back you will notice the difference! And yes, our location is unbeatable, near everything!

If you have anything else to talk about, please ask reception for my email (manager), and we continue there.

Thanks
owner_response.author: Graciacity

data.text:
I booked the hotel some time ago. Through the intermediary side, I booked a two-story bed
        
(exactly as it was written) only when I paid I received an email confirming only one person. To make sure I wrote an email to the hotel. I received a response from I only booked one place on a bunk bed for one person. (I booked 1 bunk bed). I wrote a request for a refund of 10% down payment because the booking site is misleading and gives false information. Of course I did not receive a refund and no initiative from the hotel. I do not recommend!!! Fraudsters !!!
data.title: Never in this hotel!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi, we are here to listen and improve. We understand your situation, but we dont sell an entire bunk bed for 1 person in a shared room, you can buy two beds in a shared room (twice de value of a one bed), or you buy a private twin room in which we have a bunk bed (if you pay the room, the entire bunkbed is yours to use).

I understand some of our partners might be confusing to read, we try be configure as clear as we can, but our hands are tied to their system sometimes.

If you book through our website it will be really clear what you are buying, and also it will be cheaper than any other channel!

Hope you return!
owner_response.author: Graciacity
